attributes.action: Ban & stop planting GMO seed in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
Seed used to be owned by farmers who sowed, bread, saved & exchanged it for thousands of years. Sadly, the arrival of commercial seed industries changed the whole picture. Theses Multinational Corporation had successfully taken away the ownership of seeds from the hands of the farmers in the form of patents. GMO kills wildlife like honeybees who's numbers are already in steep decline.  BASICALLY WOULD YOU WANT TO EAT THIS! NOT ME!
http://nutritionstudies.org/gmo-dangers-facts-you-need-to-know/
attributes.background:
GMO's are they worth the risk?
French molecular biologist Gilles-Éric Séralini THINKS NOT! His publication by Food & Chemical Toxicology in September 2012, presented a two-year feeding study in rats, reporting an increase in tumours among rats fed genetically modified corn & the herbicide RoundUp.
